tool_description: An API showing all the newest champions league news
name: Champions League Live News
title: Champions League Live News

api_list.name: Get The Champions League News From A Specific Source
api_list.description: Get The Champions League News From A Specific  News Resource (newspaper)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://champions-league-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/BBC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "champions-league-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://champions-league-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "champions-league-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Champions League News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the latest news of champions league
